DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis:benefits of inspiratory muscle strenght training with Respifit S decreases symptoms, disability or handicap of patients affected by COPD. The inspiratory fraction (inspiratory capacity IC/ total lung capacity TLC)may be functionally more representative than other traditional indices.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Inspiratory Muscle Training on Inspiratory Capacity in Patients With COPD
DOC.criteria: COPD GOLD IIIII (FEV1<80 and >30%) Pregnancy Lung cancer Diabetes mellitus Primary exacerbation of COPD
